sentence: Ohio Governor Mike DeWine announced Wednesday that more than $2.5 million in grants was given to agencies to support victims of family violence, domestic violence and dating violence during the COVID-19 pandemic, according to a release.
author: Schalischa Petit-De
title: 3 Miami Valley agencies receive grants to support family violence victims

sentence: “We are happy to provide this funding to help advocates of all professional disciplines work together to respond to family violence and provide coordinated services that improve the public understanding of family violence and enhance all services for victims and their children,” Governor Mike DeWine said.
title: Crisis Care Line of VW receives ARPA grant

sentence: Governor Mike DeWine is trying to fix that.
author: Morgan Trau
title: Activists on both sides of debate shoot down DeWine's proposed $10.5 million to combat gun violence
